text:
[Verse]
In the garden where we meet
Sunflowers dancing to the beat
Golden rays and laughter bright
Chasing worries out of sight

[Verse 2]
Morning dew upon the leaves
Whispers tales of summer eves
Butterflies in colored streams
Weaving through our sunflower dreams

[Chorus]
Sunflower dreams
In the sun's golden beams
Sunflower dreams
Life's more than it seems

[Verse 3]
Starry nights and summer breeze
Gentle hum of buzzing bees
Holding hands and feeling light
In this field our hearts unite

[Bridge]
Close your eyes and you will see
All the magic we believe
In this garden
Hold me close
Sunflower dreams we'll never lose

[Chorus]
Sunflower dreams
In the sun's golden beams
Sunflower dreams
Life's more than it seems
title: Sunflower Dreams
